enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve modifying the internal state of the composite collection by adding or retaining elements.
Both methods involve modifying the internal state of the composite collection by removing or retaining elements.
The containsAll method can be used to verify the state of the composite collection before invoking retainAll to ensure that the elements to be retained are indeed present.
The removeAll method can be used to clean up the composite collection before invoking retainAll to ensure that only the specified elements are retained.
